greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) is the largest least common multiple of any k-element subset of the first n positive integers.
comment: Sequence differs from A093919; first divergences are at indices 31, 40, 48, 59.
program: (MAGMA) A179661:=func< n, k | Max([ LCM(s): s in Subsets({1..n}, k) ]) >; z:=12; [ A179661(n, k): k in [1..n], n in [1..z] ]; // _Klaus Brockhaus_, Jan 16 2011
results.author: _Enrique Pérez Herrero_, Jan 09 2011
